6 Advanced modelling 6.1 Batch https://github.com/tidyverts/fable/wiki/Tidy-forecasting-with-the-fable-package Estimating multiple models is a key feature of fable. Most time series can be naturally disaggregated using a series of factors known as keys. These keys are used to uniquely identify separate time series, each of which can be modelled separately.
